Text.Page: My mission is developing weapons that give us an edge over the argons. Certainly we don't have the advantage of numbers.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Got any prototypes?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Well, I have these argon flux modulators. They're supposed to affect argons but not endanger others.

I just need you to test it in field. And not die.

This bomb should only affect hulrap bashers near {@Rgn:48008}. It probably won't kill them, but it might render them docile.

Or it might do something totally different. Report any rashes to me.
Take this argon flux modulator, test it on {@LinkCreature:48#5#hulrap bashers}, and report back to me.

It turned into a frog? Extraordinary.

If it had turned into a pigling, we'd soon have the fattest army in history.

Oh, well. Back to the drawing board.
Take this argon flux modulator, test it on hulrap bashers, and report back to me.

It shrank? Remarkable.

If I can adjust the formula to affect akalaths or gilgashes, that could change the course of the war!
Take this argon flux modulator, test it on hulrap bashers, and report back to me.

Stronger? That's bad.

I don't know where the formula went wrong. I'll go over my notes again. Back to the drawing board.
